net.proteusframework.internet.http

Interface SiteContext


  • public interface SiteContext
    Site context information.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@proteus.co)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default AuthenticationDomainList getAuthenticationDomainList()
      Get the authentication domain list for this request.

      Get the client associated to a site.

    • Method Detail

      • getAuthenticationDomainList

        default AuthenticationDomainList getAuthenticationDomainList()
        Get the authentication domain list for this request.
        Returns:
        the authentication domain list.

      • getClient

        @Nullable
Organization getClient(Site site)
        Get the client associated to a site.
        Parameters:
        site - the site.
        Returns:
        the client or null if there is no association.

      • getDefaultAuthenticationSite

        @Nullable
Site getDefaultAuthenticationSite()
        Get the default authentication site or null if not setup. Sometimes this is referred to as the proteus backend site.
        Returns:
        the site or null.

      • getFileSystemRootDirectoryName

        default java.lang.String getFileSystemRootDirectoryName(Site site)
        Get the root directory name for the specified site.
        Parameters:
        site - the site.
        Returns:
        the directory name.

      • getOperationalSite

        Site getOperationalSite()
                 throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Get the operational site.

        Operational in this case means the site in which you are currently operating on.
        If the current site is categorized as a "backend" site, then the currently selected site is returned; otherwise, the Site associated to the requested Hostname is returned.

        Returns:
        the operational site or null.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if not currently processing a request.

      • getRequestedHostname

        Hostname getRequestedHostname()
                       throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Get the requested hostname.
        Returns:
        the requested hostname.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if not currently processing a request or the requested hostname is not a hosted site.

      • getRequestedSite

        Site getRequestedSite()
               throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Get the requested site.
        Returns:
        the requested site.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if not currently processing a request or the requested site is not a hosted site.

      • getSelectedSite

        Site getSelectedSite()
              throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Get the user's currently selected site. This is a "backend" preference for the user.
        Returns:
        the currently selected site or null if the user has not currently selected a site.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if not currently processing a request.

      • setSelectedSite

        void setSelectedSite(Site site)
              throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Set the user's currently selected site. This is a "backend" preference for the user.
        Parameters:
        site - the site.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if not currently processing a request.
